name: slack
title: Slack
description: Slack API integration for channels, messages, and users

operations.name: list_channels
operations.title: List Channels
operations.description: List conversations (channels, DMs, group messages) the bot has access to

limit.description: Number of channels to return (max 200, default 100)

types.description: Comma-separated channel types: public_channel, private_channel, mpim, im

operations.name: get_channel
operations.title: Get Channel
operations.description: Get detailed information about a specific channel

operations.name: list_messages
operations.title: List Messages
operations.description: Fetch message history from a channel

channel.description: Channel ID to fetch messages from

limit.description: Number of messages to return (max 200, default 50)

oldest.description: Only messages after this Unix timestamp (inclusive)

latest.description: Only messages before this Unix timestamp (inclusive)

operations.name: send_message
operations.title: Send Message
operations.description: Send a message to a Slack channel or thread

channel.description: Channel ID to send the message to

blocks.description: JSON string of Block Kit blocks for rich message formatting

thread_ts.description: Thread timestamp to reply to (makes message a threaded reply)

operations.name: list_users
operations.title: List Users
operations.description: List all users in the Slack workspace

limit.description: Number of users to return (max 200, default 100)

operations.name: get_user
operations.title: Get User
operations.description: Get detailed profile information for a specific user

operations.name: search_messages
operations.title: Search Messages
operations.description: Search for messages across the workspace

count.description: Number of results per page (max 100, default 20)

operations.name: upload_file
operations.title: Upload File
operations.description: Upload a file to one or more Slack channels

channels.description: Comma-separated channel IDs to share the file to

initial_comment.description: Initial comment to add to the file when shared
